channel.title: Problem with Overwatch mod
channel.description:
Hello there, I seem to be getting a problem with the 1.5 version of Overwatch. I try running it from steam and loads for a second before throwing a "could not load library" error. I tried changing the SteamAppId to 215 instead of the original 218 and still doesn't work.
Help?

item.title: Problem with Overwatch mod
item.dc:creator: Zen609
item.description:
Valve has fixed the issue. Update the 2007 SDK.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Overwatch mod

item.description:

SDK update broke mod support.
